work-item.field:
• workitems-trend-data: constant which references all metrics defined in workitem-metrics.xml configuration file. If referenced metric is a distribution following options are possible
    • <key>/* = display all distribution values as chart
    • <key>/myid = only display values of myid
  • Update button: \{update-report-footer:report-path=charts/abc-risk-trend.xml|calculation=trackeranalysis\}

In some cases web browser caches the old images so it seems that the chart was not updated. Clear the cache or start a different browser to make sure that the chart image was not cached accidentally by your web browser
